json.Problem: Client spends 10+ hours/week manually processing inbound form submissions, triaging leads, and updating their CRM.
json.Solution: Build an automated workflow that captures form submissions, scores and routes leads based on rules, and updates the CRM + notifies the right team.
json.Scope:
•	Integration with form tool (Typeform/Google Forms/etc.)
	•	Lead scoring logic (based on predefined criteria)
	•	CRM automation (HubSpot, Pipedrive, etc.)
	•	Slack/Email notifications
	•	Error handling + logging
json.How soon?: 3–5 business days from kickoff. Rush available.
